dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Investors Hope Earnings Season Can Revive Faltering Stock Rally
News Content: With the Fed unlikely to cut interest rates as quickly as hoped, corporate earnings growth becomes even more critical to keeping the market afloat.

Continue reading

View comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.05, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.1
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news headline suggests that investors are looking to earnings season to revive a faltering stock rally, indicating some uncertainty in the market. The mention of the Fed unlikely to cut interest rates quickly adds to the cautious sentiment, making corporate earnings growth critical. Previous predictions from other models show a mixed outlook, with some leaning towards a rise (e.g., GPT-4o-mini at 0.65) and others towards a fall (e.g., Gemini-2.0-flash at 0.6). The average of these predictions suggests a slight bias towards a rise, but the uncertainty in the news content tempers this optimism. Considering the mixed signals and the importance of upcoming earnings, the probabilities are balanced but with a slight edge towards a rise due to potential positive earnings surprises.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Investors Hope Earnings Season Can Revive Faltering Stock Rally",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.52,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.48
}
```
